title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Scientific Creativity Based on STEM Approaches for Gifted Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts mastery and problem-solving competencies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can enhance their ability to systematically solve complex scientific problems using a STEM-integrated approach.
Participants can improve scientific creativity by over 20% through experimental design and data analysis.
Participants can complete at least three collaborative problem-solving projects using digital learning tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
